modName: Hunters Redoubt - Player Home with Quest
summary: Adds a detailed new Player Home on a hill near Falkreath. The Estate is gained by completing the Quest \"Bhatars Heritage\" in the Dead Man`s Drink in Falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17994-2-1338550156.jpg[/img]

[size=+2][color=red][b]IMPORTANT[/b][/color][/size]
This Mod is currently in BETA. If you find Bugs, comment them.


[b][u][color=black]Recommended[/color][/u][/b]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15105ENB]Sharpshooter\'s Extreme Graphics Vision ENB[/url]
Best ENB so far (my Opinion), also used to take the Screenshots.

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17605]Claralux[/url]
Awesome lighting effects, be sure to check that out.

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15094]ScenicCarriages[/url]
One of the best Mods i\'ve ever seen. Awesome feeling to travel like this.

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12693]Einherjar Armor[/url]
Most preferred armor mod, be sure to check that out too!



[b][u][color=black]Description[/color][/u][/b]

Player Home/Estate near Falkreath, which is gainable through the Quest \"Bhatars Heritage in Falkreath. The Questgiver, Bhatar, is located in Falkreath\'s Tavern Dead Man\'s Drink.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17994-1-1338551525.jpg[/img]

After completing the Quest, the House is found on a Hill above the Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary in Falkreath, for more Detail look at the Screenshots.

The Estate consists out of 4 parts, the Exterior, the Interior, the Basement and the Rooftop.
Outside, there is a Forge, a Workbench, a Grinding Wheel and a Tanning Rack. There is also seating furniture, including one bench near the Waterfall. Beside these, there is your own House Merchant, which sells from 08:00 to 10:00 goods and also drives you to every hold Capital.
(ScenicCarriages not compatible yet, will hopefully fix this soon!)

Inside, there are 3 Mannequins, Weapon Racks, Display Cases, Arcane Enchanter and a Map of Skyrim.
In the Basement, there is 1 Mannequin, Fireplace, Alchemy Table, and a lot of Sovngarde Mead!
On the Rooftop, there is a Bedroll for sleeping under the Stars and some Furniture.


[b][u][color=black]Installation[/color][/u][/b]

I HIGHLY recommend to use NexusModManager to install. Its the easiest way of installing it.
But if you want to install it manually, drop the .ESP and the .BSA in your Skyrim Data Folder, then activate them in NMM or Steam.


[b][u][color=black]Deinstallation[/color][/u][/b]

If you have installed it with NexusModManager, deinstall it by double-clicking on the mod\'s name.
If you have installed it manually, delete the Hunter`s Redoubt.esp and the Hunter`s Redoubt.bsa in your Skyrim Data Folder.


[b][u][color=black]Known Issues or Bugs[/color][/u][/b]

Right now, there are no Issues or Bugs, except the the Carriage Horse, which is a little bit anxious sometimes (doesn\'t stand on it\'s original place).
